metadata.synopsis: Player spots a rack of rusted Dark Justiciar arms and armour, abandoned for some time. Reactivity for clerics and paladins of Shar.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to -582.304; 23.802; 417.9 in the Duergar camp and click on S_UND_JusticiarWeaponRack001_bd4e8f82-74bb-4a3c-9f5e-c4e3a442dfa9.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Someone forgot to oil their equipment. Everything here is rusted to the Hells and back.
0.context: NodeContext: Karlach: i.e. 'couldn't use it to fight off a kitten'

1.speaker: Player
1.text: These are Sharran weapons. I would recognise the Nightsinger's blades anywhere.
